#LOAD PACKAGES
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)


```



```{r}

cities_income <- individual %>%
          filter(URBAN2011 == "(1) urban 1", WS10 < 80000) %>%
          select(RO7, WS3NM, WS4, WS5, WS10, WS10ANNUAL)
         


ggplot(cities_income, aes(x = RO7, y = WS10ANNUAL))+
      geom_boxplot()+
      theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))


```
